title: Lifestyle Writing
description:
This module aims to equip students with the relevant skills to write feature stories targeted at readers of lifestyle magazines. It will cover the different genres
including personality profiles, elements of a review piece as well as trend stories. The students will also be introduced to elements of feature photography and be
exposed to different writing styles. This module will complement the Cultural Studies track, and prepare them more holistically for media jobs in the arts,
culture and entertainment sector.
prerequisite: (1) Completed 80MCs, including 28MCs in NM, with a minimum CAP of 3.20 or be on the Honours track. (2) NM2220 Introduction to Media Writing
